items.title: Project support
items.text: Germinate now supports projects. These introduce another level of data grouping above experiments. When projects are selected via the web interface, Germinate will only show data related to the selected projects.

items.title: Radar, bubble and heatmap charts
items.text: For categorical trait data, we've added radar, bubble and heatmap charts to visualize the data for a selection of germplasm entries against a subset of the traits.

items.title: Institution datasets information
items.text: The data statistics page now contains a table that breaks lists the number of datasets per data type for each institution to show their contribution to the overall database.

items.title: WYSIWYG editor
items.text: Added a 'what you see is what you get' (WYSIWYG) editor to the home and about page so that administrators can edit the page content through the web interface.

items.title: Trait enhancements
items.text: Added trait reference image functionality as well as information about trait set size (how many measurements per subject) and timeseries flag to traits.

items.title: Dependency update
items.text: Updated to Java 21 LTS, Node 22 LTS and Gradle 8.8.

items.title: Various bugfixes
items.text: Fixed various issues across the board but including data import, dataset editing and trait data export.

items.title: Trait data import
items.text: Fixed an issue with the import of trials data where importing data for non-existent traits would fail.

items.title: Helium URL
items.text: Fixed an issue where the wrong Helium URL was used for exported pedigree data.

items.title: Database connection timeout
items.text: Some long-running data import jobs timed out the database connection. Added reconnect parameter.

items.title: BrAPI call set endpoint
items.text: Fixed issue where BrAPI call set calls would exceed maximum allowed database connection size.

items.title: Tomcat security
items.text: This update mainly adds some Tomcat security features.

items.title: Data stories
items.text: Data stories are a convenient way to showcase some of the data in your Germinate database and make it easy to follow pre-defined steps highlighting specifics of your data.

items.title: Interface selection persistency
items.text: To make it easier to share the view you're currently seeing including selections, we have added more selection parameters to the URL. This also helps with the data stories.

items.title: Hidden page auto-discovery
items.text: Germinate can now automatically discover which interface pages should be hidden based on the data you currently have in your database. As an example, if you don't have genotypic data, the maps, markers and genotypic export pages will automatically be hidden until you upload genotypic data.

items.title: Theme-based map tiles
items.text: As the new default, we have added theme-based map tiles to Germinate to make any data overlays pop even more.

items.title: Trials data coloring
items.text: Trials data scatter plots can now be colored by location, so for multi-site trials, you can highlight each location individually.

items.title: Map positions
items.text: There was a bug affecting the display of genotypic marker positions in the map details table. This has been fixed.

items.title: Tomcat 10.1
items.text: Germinate has been updated to use Tomcat version 10.1

items.title: Changelog
items.text: From this version on, Germinate will include a changelog for each version highlighting the major new features and changes of each release. This changelog is available on the 'About Germinate' page as well as by clicking on the version number in the Germinate footer.

items.title: Trials time series data
items.text: We have added a new section to the trials page focusing on trials data in a temporal context where the development of each germplasm and trait is visualized through the trial.

items.title: Unmanned aerial vehicle (UAV) imagery support
items.text: Germinate now supports storing the imagery captured by UAVs throughout a trial alongside the measured data. The images will be visualized on a map and can be flicked through based on the time of recording.

items.title: Shapefile support
items.text: In tandem with the UAV imagery support, we have added support for uploading the trial layout in form of Shapefiles. These will be shown on top of any UAV imagery and colour-coded based on the measured trials data values.

items.title: User feedback
items.text: We have added a way for your users to provide feedback to you on Germinate and the data within it. If enabled, the users can select a snapshot of their screen and provide additional information as well as a feedback type like 'bug', 'data error' or 'question'. This feedback can be reviewed and acted upon by the database owners.

items.title: Boxplot charts
items.text: Previously, Germinate pre-calculated any boxplot data on the server before displaying the result in the browser. This has now changed so that Germinate will display the individual data points alongside the boxplots which allows selection and item marking in those visualizations.

items.title: Boxplot grouping
items.text: In addition to the changed boxplot charts, they can now be grouped by 'dataset', 'treatment' and 'group' to further enrich the visualization.

items.title: Data update widget
items.text: Whenever data is uploaded, a new item will now be created on the front page highlighting that new data is available. This will make it much more obvious to users that new data is available or data has changed.

items.title: Dataset changes/edits
items.text: After data has been uploaded to Germinate it is assigned to a dataset. While the meta-data of dataset could be edited previously, it wasn't possible to delete datasets completely or re-assign them to different experiments. We have now added this functionality. Additionally, new (empty) datasets can now be created through the Germinate interface which makes importing data from GridScore easier.

items.title: Germinate setup wizard
items.text: A new Germinate setup wizard has been added to simplify the initial setup of Germinate.

items.title: Compounds merge with traits
items.text: Because of their large overlap in the way they are stored, chemical compounds have been merged in with traits and chemical compound data is now available as trait data.

items.title: BrAPI endpoint bug
items.text: Fixed a bug where the BrAPI endpoint for observation variables might fail depending on the trait restrictions.
